Key:
(I'm going to go check on Kotori. She never
usually cooks. I wonder what she's going to make.)
Kotori, can I help you with anything? I'm bored...

Shido, perfect timing. I want you to get down on
all fours.
Okay... Hey, wait! What do you mean by that?

I'm not asking you to give me a ride or kiss my
feet or anything. Just hurry up and do it.
Tell me the reason before I do it.

I can't reach the plate on the top shelf. Isn't it
obvious?
Oh, I thought you were...

What? If you want to be a pet dog or something,
and depend on me for the rest of your life, I can
definitely hear you out.

Of course not! Anyways, sure... But couldn't you
have used a chair?

I was just thinking that, but you came at such a
perfect time. I took that to mean that you wanted
your little sister to use you as a step stool.
...I came at a horrible time.
Just do it.
Okay, okay.
You ready? I'm going to get on.
Sure.
Here I go. Hmmm...
Did you find it?

How does it feel to be a horse? Being in service
to your little sister.
Forget that, just hurry up and get the plate!
...There it is. Okay, I got it.
Cool.
Thanks, you can go now.
Is there anything else you want me to do?

Don't worry about me. Just look forward to my
dish. Now go.
...I-I don't know about this.
